original: intros A R. unfold Monotonic. intros b x y x' y' H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold subrel in H1. unfold subrel in H2. unfold Transport, impl in H3. unfold Transport, impl in H4. intros a1 a2 Ha. destruct b; simpl in *. - apply (arrow_pointwise_subrel bool A A R (- ==> R)%type). apply H1. - apply (arrow_pointwise_subrel bool A A R (- ==> R)%type). apply H2.
